MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML3 postcode area of Hamilton, affecting properties in Donaldson Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 05:05am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on our underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37am on the 29th of January 2021.
